label: 衛門府
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: The corps of guards who guarded the gates of the palace compound.  They were divided into Left Gate Watch (Saemon) and Right Gate Watch  (Uemon).  The chief officer on each side was the Intendant (junior fourth rank, lower grade), followed by  Deputy (junior fifth rank, upper grade) and Aide (junior sixth rank, upper grade).[左衛門、右衛門][RK]
